Battera::

She transformed into bat mode and followed Blackstorm. "Well, 
comrades in arms around here are hard to find." as she flew. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Blackstorm:
> 
> The femme looked to Battera and said "I think that Maxima will be 
> agree... "
> 
> And looking to Maxima she said "I'm ready to go, Maxima.... Battera 
> it's new here can she join us...? Ya know that close link with 
> comrades are very usefull in case of attack"
> 
> she said that while she transformed to her robot mode and followed 
> Maxima...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > She turned to see Blackstorm. "I hope you are energised. This 
will 
> be a long 
> > trip." 
> > 
> > She didn't wait for a response. Acting similar to the way she was 
> in the 
> > past; she opened the doors, Made sure the sentinel systems would 
> not target 
> > the both of them... then made her way outside. There she trotted, 
> leapt into 
> > the air, & transformed quickly & masterfully into a form that was 
> similar to 
> > a jet.. roughly.
